*THIS IS THE FILE E59418C\CDAT.TXT THAT CONSTRUCTS DETAILED CANADIAN CONSUMPTION DATA 1971-2017   JUNE 23,2018
SIZE 2000                
PAR 4000
SET NODOECHO
SMPL 1 47
DO #= 1,20
GENR VC#=0
GENR QC#=0
GENR PC#=0
GENR VCN#=0
GENR QCN#=0
GENR PCN#=0
ENDO
GENR C=0
GENR YEAR=TIME(1970)
*DETAILED CONSUMPTION DATA CAN BE FOUND IN THE SOURCE OECD.STAT, DETAILED NATIONAL ACCOUNTS, TABLE 5 (DATASET 5): FINAL CONSUMPTION
*EXPENDITURES OF HOUSEHOLDS, COUNTRY: CANADA, C: National currency, current prices, millions; FREQUENCY: ANNUAL
*IN 2012, THE OECD.STAT TABLES FOR CANADA WENT BACK TO 1971; TODAY IN 2018, THEY ONLY GO BACK TO 1981
*THUS WE WILL HAVE TO READ IN 2 SETS OF TABLES; THE OLD SET WHICH COVERS 1971-2010 AND THE 2018 SET WHICH COVERS 1981-2017
SMPL 1 40
*READ IN THE 1971-2010 DATA																																					
READ VC1 / BYVAR
8238	9116	10778	12790	14525	15105	16615	18825	21178	23401	26201	28101	29264	31410	32789	
34619	36670	37951	39793	41975	43446	43427	45036	45810	47418	48731	50320	52157	53972	56547	
59786	62325	64696	67105	69334	72189	75238	79571	84272	86846
*VC1 IS THE SERIES P31CP010: Food and non-alcoholic beverages

*VC19 IS THE SERIES     P31CP120: Miscellaneous goods and services
*THIS CATEGORY IS REALLY MISC SERVICES: HERE IS A LISTING OF THE SUBCATEGORIES IN THIS CATEGOR:
*P31CP121: Personal care
*P31CP122: Prostitution
*P31CP123: Personal effects n. e. c.
*P31CP124: Social protection
*P31CP125: Insurance
*P31CP126: Financial services n. e. c.
*P31CP127: Other services n. e. c.
*THUS CATEGORY 19 IS PRIMARILY PERSONAL AND FINANCIAL SERVICES.
READ VC20 / BYVAR
1330	1350	1582	1809	2304	2807	3281	3613	3417	3924	4180	4349	5303	5687	6140	
6402	7569	8377	10039	12742	13210	13788	13833	12677	12876	13866	14458	13967	14844	16523	
17212	16769	17214	19912	21929	23875	27335	29745	29097	31890
*VC20 IS THE SERIES   P33: Final consumption expenditure of resident households abroad
*THESE EXPENDITURES ARE TOURISM EXPENDITURES
*THERE ARE 12 TWO DIGIT CONSUMPTION CLASSIFICATIONS (PLUS TOURISM EXPENDITURES) AND FOR THE MOST PART, I HAVE JUST USED 
*THESE CLASSES OF GOODS AND SERVICES. HOWEVER,  FOR 3 OF THESE TWO DIGIT CLASSES, I HAVE GONE DOWN TO THE THREE DIGIT CLASSES.
*THE THREE CLASSES ARE: (1) P31CP020: Alcoholic beverages, tobacco and narcotics;
*(2) P31CP040: Housing, water, electricity, gas and other fuels AND
*(3) P31CP070: Transport.
*THE LAST TWO CATEGORIES HAVE SIGNIFICANT ENERGY INPUTS AS PART OF THE BROAD CLASSIFICATION AND IT IS GOOD TO 
*SEPARATE OUT ENERGY PURCHASES AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE SINCE THE PRICE PATH OF ENERGY INPUTS IS VERY DIFFERENT FROM
*OTHER GOODS AND SERVICES. THE PRICES OF TOBACCO AND ALCOHOL ALSO HAVE MOVED RATHER DIFFERENTLY OVER TIME.
*IT WOULD HAVE BEEN GOOD TO DISAGGREGATE SOME OF THE OTHER CATEGORIES AS WELL BUT THE PRESENT CLASSIFICATION WILL DO.

*NOW READ IN THE ABOVE SERIES FROM THE 2018 OECD.STAT TABLE. IT COVERS THE 34 YEARS 1981-2017
*SOURCE: OECD.STAT: DETAILED NATIONAL ACCOUNTS, TABLE 5 (DATASET 5): FINAL CONSUMPTION
*EXPENDITURES OF HOUSEHOLDS, COUNTRY: CANADA, C: National currency, current prices, millions; FREQUENCY: ANNUAL
SMPL 11 47
READ VCN1 / BYVAR

*VCN20 IS THE SERIES   P33: Final consumption expenditure of resident households abroad
*THESE EXPENDITURES ARE TOURISM EXPENDITURES
*THE NEW AND OLD SERIES CAN BE COMPARED FOR OBSERVATIONS 11 TO 40; COMPARE THEM
SMPL 11 40
FORMAT(F8.0,10F10.0)
PRINT YEAR VC1 VCN1 VC2 VCN2 VC3 VCN3 VC4 VCN4 VC5 VCN5 / FORMAT
STAT VC1 VCN1 VC2 VCN2 VC3 VCN3 VC4 VCN4 VC5 VCN5 
PRINT YEAR VC6 VCN6 VC7 VCN7 VC8 VCN8 VC9 VCN9 VC10 VCN10 / FORMAT
STAT VC6 VCN6 VC7 VCN7 VC8 VCN8 VC9 VCN9 VC10 VCN10 
PRINT YEAR VC11 VCN11 VC12 VCN12 VC13 VCN13 VC14 VCN14 VC15 VCN15 / FORMAT
STAT VC11 VCN11 VC12 VCN12 VC13 VCN13 VC14 VCN14 VC15 VCN15
PRINT YEAR VC16 VCN16 VC17 VCN17 VC18 VCN18 VC19 VCN19 VC20 VCN20 / FORMAT
STAT VC16 VCN16 VC17 VCN17 VC18 VCN18 VC19 VCN19 VC20 VCN20
*IT CAN BE SEEN THAT THE REVISIONS ARE SOMETIMES QUITE LARGE. THIS SEEMS TO BE NORMAL ACROSS COUNTRIES!
*FOR MANY SERIES, THE REVISIONS ARE NOT LARGE BUT FOR SOME SERIES, THEY CAN DIFFER BY AS MUCH AS 10%
*WE WILL USE THE RATES OF GROWTH OF THE OLD SERIES TO BACKFILL THE NEW SERIES (OUR USUAL METHOD OF
*LINKING OLD SERIES TO NEWER SERIES). WE ASSUME THAT THE NEWER SERIES ARE THE MORE ACCURATE SERIES.
SMPL 1 10
DO #=1,20
GENR VCN#=VC#*VCN#(11)/VC#(11)
ENDO 
*CHECK WHETHER THE RESULTING SERIES ARE NICE AND CONTINUOUS
SMPL 1 47
PRINT YEAR VCN1-VCN10 / FORMAT
PRINT YEAR VCN11-VCN20 / FORMAT

*NOW READ IN THE CORRESPONDING REAL SERIES (QUANTITY SERIES) AT CONSTANT PRICES FOR THE YEARS 1971-2010 
*SOURCE: OECD.STAT, DETAILED NATIONAL ACCOUNTS, TABLE 5 (DATASET 5): FINAL CONSUMPTION
*EXPENDITURES OF HOUSEHOLDS, COUNTRY: CANADA, V: National currency, constant prices, national base year, millions																																					
*FREQUENCY: ANNUAL, NOTE: YOU CAN USE THE CONSTANT PRICE DATA USING THE NATIONAL BASE YEAR OR THE OECD BASE YEAR
*IT WILL NOT MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE IN THE END.
SMPL 1 40			 
READ QC1 / BYVAR
38837	39658	40690	41671	42175	42991	43387	43811	44188	44575	44954	45363	45669	46300	47237	
47439	48084	48705	49581	50333	50951	51576	52363	53078	53959	54830	55819	57136	58455	60423	
61340	62325	63549	64743	65238	66383	67541	68977	69573	70905
*QC1 IS THE SERIES P31CP010: Food and non-alcoholic beverages
READ QC2 / BYVAR

12693	13316	13725	13907	14294	14901	15517	16064	16220	16762
*QC2 IS THE SERIES       P31CP021: Alcoholic beverages
READ QC3 / BYVAR
16410	17001	17570	18017	18307	18184	18474	18028	18842	19032	19467	19472	18705	17792	17266	
16035	15322	15409	15040	14170	13361	12436	11513	12941	13769	13956	14047	14121	13520	13258

*QC3 IS THE SERIES        P31CP022: Tobacco

READ QCN20 / BYVAR
10226	9821	11335	11115	10906	10791	12541	14417	17136	20725	21264	20616	18767	16054	16076

36767	38605	38097	36816	34832	33835	36437
*QCN20 IS THE SERIES   P33: Final consumption expenditure of resident households abroad

*WE WILL USE THE RATES OF GROWTH OF THE OLD SERIES TO BACKFILL THE NEW SERIES (OUR USUAL METHOD OF
*LINKING OLD SERIES TO NEWER SERIES). WE ASSUME THAT THE NEWER SERIES ARE THE MORE ACCURATE SERIES.
SMPL 1 10
DO #=1,20
GENR QCN#=QC#*QCN#(11)/QC#(11)
ENDO 
*CHECK WHETHER THE RESULTING SERIES ARE NICE AND CONTINUOUS
SMPL 1 47
FORMAT(F8.0,10F10.1)
PRINT YEAR QCN1-QCN10 / FORMAT
PRINT YEAR QCN11-QCN20 / FORMAT
*THE SERIES ARE NICE AND CONTINUOUS

*DIVIDE BY 1000 TO REDUCE THE SIZE OF THE UNITS; SWITCH TO BILLIONS OF DOLLARS FROM MILLIONS
DO #=1,20
GENR QCN#=QCN#/1000
GENR VCN#=VCN#/1000
ENDO
*GENR IMPLICIT PRICES
DO #=1,20
GENR PCN#=VCN#/QCN#
ENDO
*NORMALIZE ALL PRICES TO EQUAL 1 IN THE BASE PERIOD
DO #=1,20
GENR C#=PCN#(1)
GENR PCN#=PCN#/C#
GENR QCN#=QCN#*C#
ENDO
FORMAT(F8.0,10F10.5)
PRINT YEAR QCN1-QCN10 / FORMAT
PRINT YEAR VCN1-VCN10 / FORMAT
PRINT YEAR QCN11-QCN20 / FORMAT
PRINT YEAR VCN11-VCN20 / FORMAT
PRINT YEAR PCN1-PCN10 / FORMAT
PRINT YEAR PCN11-PCN20 / FORMAT

*RELABEL SERIES 1-4
DO #=1,4
GENR Q#=QCN#
GENR P#=PCN#
ENDO
*WE WILL FORM A HOUSING AGGREGATE; I.E., AGGREGATE COMMODITIES 5-8 INTO HOUSING SERVICES
INDEX PCN5 QCN5 PCN6 QCN6 PCN7 QCN7 PCN8 QCN8 / CHAIN FISHER=P5 QFISHER=Q5
*RELABEL COMMODITIES 9-20 AS COMMODITIES 6-17
GENR P6=PCN9
GENR P7=PCN10
GENR P8=PCN11
GENR P9=PCN12
GENR P10=PCN13
GENR P11=PCN14
GENR P12=PCN15
GENR P13=PCN16
GENR P14=PCN17
GENR P15=PCN18
GENR P16=PCN19
GENR P17=PCN20
GENR Q6=QCN9
GENR Q7=QCN10
GENR Q8=QCN11
GENR Q9=QCN12
GENR Q10=QCN13
GENR Q11=QCN14
GENR Q12=QCN15
GENR Q13=QCN16
GENR Q14=QCN17
GENR Q15=QCN18
GENR Q16=QCN19
GENR Q17=QCN20
DO #=1,17
GENR V#=P#*Q# 
ENDO
*PRINT OUT THE NEW NORMALIZED P AND Q DATA
FORMAT(F8.0,9F10.5)
PRINT YEAR P1-P9 / FORMAT
PRINT YEAR P10-P17 / FORMAT
PRINT YEAR Q1-Q9 / FORMAT
PRINT YEAR Q10-Q17 / FORMAT
*V1 IS THE SERIES       P31CP010: Food and non-alcoholic beverages
*V2 IS THE SERIES       P31CP021: Alcoholic beverages
*V3 IS THE SERIES       P31CP022: Tobacco
*V4 IS THE SERIES       P31CP030: Clothing and footwear
*V5 IS THE SERIES       P31CP041+P31CP042+P31CP043+P31CP044: HOUSING AGGREGATE
*V6 IS THE SERIES       P31CP045: Electricity, gas and other fuels
*V7 IS THE SERIES       P31CP050: Furnishings, households equipment and routine maintenance of the house
*V8 IS THE SERIES       P31CP060: Health
*V9 IS THE SERIES       P31CP071: Purchase of vehicles
*V10 IS THE SERIES      P31CP072: Operation of personal transport equipment
*V11 IS THE SERIES      P31CP073: Transport services
*V12 IS THE SERIES      P31CP080: Communications
*V13 IS THE SERIES      P31CP090: Recreation and culture
*V14 IS THE SERIES      P31CP100: Education
*V15 IS THE SERIES      P31CP110: Restaurants and hotels
*V16 IS THE SERIES      P31CP120: Miscellaneous goods and services
*V17 IS THE SERIES      P33:      Final consumption expenditure of resident households abroad
PRINT YEAR V1-V9 / FORMAT
PRINT YEAR V10-V17 / FORMAT

*READ IN THE ECONOMICALLY ACTIVE POPULATION SERIES AGES 15-64 FROM YOUR DATA CONSTRUCTION FILE FOR THE YEARS 1971-2017
SMPL 1 47
READ YEAR POP
 1971.        13767.0
 1972.        14071.0
 1973.        14398.0
 1974.        14760.0
 1975.        15127.0
 1976.        15466.0
 1977.        15770.0
 1978.        16054.0
 1979.        16326.0
 1980.        16638.0
 1981.        16911.0
 1982.        17150.0
 1983.        17344.0
 1984.        17525.0
 1985.        17689.0
 1986.        17876.0
 1987.        18083.0
 1988.        18288.0
 1989.        18594.0
 1990.        18837.3
 1991.        19029.4
 1992.        19207.6
 1993.        19392.6
 1994.        19605.2
 1995.        19821.3
 1996.        20045.2
 1997.        20273.7
 1998.        20472.3
 1999.        20696.3
 2000.        20950.3
 2001.        21242.4
 2002.        21532.4
 2003.        21779.6
 2004.        22044.6
 2005.        22326.8
 2006.        22599.5
 2007.        22876.1
 2008.        23150.3
 2009.        23421.7
 2010.        23674.5
 2011.        23865.7
 2012.        24030.5
 2013.        24102.0
 2014.        24246.0
 2015.        24453.4
 2016.        24752.1
 2017         25160.5
*DIVIDE BY 1,000 TO REDUCE THE UNITS FOR POP (A SWITCH FROM THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE TO MILLIONS OF PEOPLE)
GENR POP=POP/1000
*NOW GENR PER POP CONSUMPTION BY COMMODITY CLASS FOR CANADA
DO #=1,17
GENR Q#=Q#/POP
GENR V#=V#/POP
ENDO
*THE PRICES WILL NOT CHANGE.
*PRINT OUT PER CAPITA DATA SET
FORMAT(F8.0,9F10.5)
PRINT YEAR P1-P9 / FORMAT
PRINT YEAR P10-P17 / FORMAT
PRINT YEAR Q1-Q9 / FORMAT
PRINT YEAR Q10-Q17 / FORMAT
*1 IS THE SERIES       P31CP010: Food and non-alcoholic beverages
*2 IS THE SERIES       P31CP021: Alcoholic beverages
*3 IS THE SERIES       P31CP022: Tobacco
*4 IS THE SERIES       P31CP030: Clothing and footwear
*5 IS THE SERIES       P31CP041+P31CP042+P31CP043+P31CP044: HOUSING AGGREGATE
*6 IS THE SERIES       P31CP045: Electricity, gas and other fuels
*7 IS THE SERIES       P31CP050: Furnishings, households equipment and routine maintenance of the house
*8 IS THE SERIES       P31CP060: Health
*9 IS THE SERIES       P31CP071: Purchase of vehicles
*10 IS THE SERIES      P31CP072: Operation of personal transport equipment
*11 IS THE SERIES      P31CP073: Transport services
*12 IS THE SERIES      P31CP080: Communications
*13 IS THE SERIES      P31CP090: Recreation and culture
*14 IS THE SERIES      P31CP100: Education
*15 IS THE SERIES      P31CP110: Restaurants and hotels
*16 IS THE SERIES      P31CP120: Miscellaneous goods and services
*17 IS THE SERIES      P33:      Final consumption expenditure of resident households abroad
STOP
